title: 75 Ramit Sethi on Building an Empire, Powerful Habits, and the Art of Becoming the Best
description: Ramit Sethi teaches people how to be rich. In this podcast I ask him about the hobbies and moments that shaped him to his success today. How to hire and run effective teams that build your business. How to spend like a millionaire but save like an all-star plus much more. Dive in and check out lewishowes.com/75 for more
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
